真.definition: really; truly; indeed; real; true; genuine

真人.definition: a real person; Daoist spiritual master

真人不露相.definition: the sage presents as an ordinary person (idiom)

真假.definition: genuine or fake; true or false

真假難辨.definition: hard to distinguish real from imitation

真偽莫辨.definition: can't judge true or false (idiom); unable to distinguish the genuine from the fake; not to know whether to believe (what one reads in the news)

真傳.definition: authentic tradition; handed-down teachings or techniques

真刀真槍.definition: lit. real swords and spears (idiom); fig. very much for real; genuine

真分數.definition: proper fraction (with numerator < denominator, e.g. five sevenths); see also: improper fraction 假分數|假分数[jia3 fen1 shu4] and mixed number 帶分數|带分数[dai4 fen1 shu4]

真命.definition: to receive heaven's command (of Daoist immortals etc); ordained by heaven

真實感.definition: the feeling that sth is genuine; sense of reality; in the flesh

真後生動物.definition: eumetazoa; subkingdom of animals excluding sponges

真心話大冒險.pinyin: Zhen1 xin1 hua4 Da4 Mao4 xian3
真心話大冒險.definition: The Moment of Truth (TV show); Truth or Dare (game)

真怪.definition: odd; unusual; I can't believe that ...

真情實意.definition: out of genuine friendship (idiom); sincere feelings

真意.definition: real intention; true meaning; correct interpretation

真憑實據.definition: reliable evidence (idiom); conclusive proof; definitive evidence

真才實學.definition: solid learning; real ability and learning; genuine talent

真是.definition: indeed; truly; (coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc)

真有你的.definition: You're really quite something!; You're just amazing!

真武.definition: Lord of profound heaven, major Daoist deity; aka Black Tortoise 玄武 or Black heavenly emperor 玄天上帝

真版.definition: real version (as opposed to pirated); genuine version

真理部.definition: Ministry of Truth, a fictional ministry from George Orwell's novel Nineteen Eighty-Four

真番郡.definition: Zhenpan commandery (108 BC-c. 300 AD), one of four Han dynasty commanderies in north Korea

真的.definition: really; truly; indeed; real; true; genuine; (math.) proper

真相.definition: the truth about sth; the actual facts

真相大白.definition: the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear

真相畢露.definition: real face fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth

真空.definition: (physics, fig.) vacuum; (slang) to not wear underwear

真聲.definition: natural voice; modal voice (cf. 假聲|假声[jia3 sheng1], falsetto)

真聲最高音.definition: (music) the highest note one can sing in a natural (non-falsetto) voice

真臘.definition: Khmer kingdom of Kampuchea or Cambodia; Chinese term for Cambodia from 7th to 15th century

真蜆.definition: Corbicula leana, a species of clam

真言.definition: true statement; incantation (translates Sanskrit: dharani 陀羅尼|陀罗尼)

真詮.definition: to explain truly (esp. of classic or religious text); true commentary; correct exegesis

真諦.definition: the real meaning; the true essence

真象.definition: (variant of 真相[zhen1 xiang4]) the truth about sth; the actual facts

真跡.definition: authentic (painting or calligraphy); genuine work (of famous artist)

真身.definition: the real body (of Buddha or a God); true effigy

真金不怕火來燒.pinyin: zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lai2 shao1
真金不怕火來燒.definition: see 真金不怕火煉|真金不怕火炼[zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lian4]

真金不怕火煉.pinyin: zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lian4

真香.definition: awesome (expression of approval used hypocritically after bitching about the exact same thing earlier) (neologism c. 2014)
